  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1287
Use case name: ORA11G_TimestampTable_to_ORA11G_Table_NoClient
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table NoClient table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timestamp_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

Use case name: ORA11G_TimestampTable_trimWhitespace_to_ORA11G_Partition
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Partition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -G[--to_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timestamp_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Partitioned_test_to ^
  -G part_15 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."

  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timestamp_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1295
Use case name: ORA11G_TimestampTable_trimWhitespace_to_ORA11G_Table_NoClient
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table NoClient table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timestamp_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1296

Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."

  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."

  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^

  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^

  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1298
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneQueryFile_to_ORA11G_Partition
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into Oracle11G Partition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -G[--to_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Partitioned_test_to ^
  -G part_15 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1300
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneQueryFile_to_ORA11G_Subpartition
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into Oracle11G Subpartition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -N[--to_sub_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."

  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -N part_15_sp1 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Sub_Partitioned_test_to ^
  -N part_15_sp1 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1302
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneQueryFile_to_ORA11G_Table
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into Oracle11G Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1303
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneQueryFile_to_ORA11G_Table_NoClient
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into Oracle11G Table NoClient table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneQueryFile_to_ORA11G_Table_TruncateTarget
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into Oracle11G Table TruncateTarget table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example:

  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^

  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^

  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Partition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -G[--to_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."

  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Partitioned_test_to ^
  -G part_15 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1309
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_KeepSpoolFile_to_ORA11G_Subpartition_TruncateTarget
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Subpartition TruncateTarget table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -N[--to_sub_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  python -c "print 'y\ny'" |C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Sub_Partitioned_test_to ^
  -N part_15_sp1 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1310
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_KeepSpoolFile_to_ORA11G_Table
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1311
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_KeepSpoolFile_to_ORA11G_Table_NoClient
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table NoClient table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1312
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_KeepSpoolFile_to_ORA11G_Table_TruncateTarget
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table TruncateTarget table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  python -c "print 'y\ny'" |C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1313
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_KeepSpoolFile_to_ORA11G_Table_TruncateTarget_NoClient
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Table TruncateTarget NoClient table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  python -c "print 'y\ny'" |C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^

  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^

  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1314
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_to_ORA11G_Partition
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Partition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -G[--to_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Partitioned_test_to ^
  -G part_15 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1315
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_to_ORA11G_Partition_TruncateTarget
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Partition TruncateTarget table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -G[--to_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."

  python -c "print 'y\ny'" |C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^

  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Partitioned_test_to ^
  -G part_15 ^

  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^

-USE-CASE # 1316
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_to_ORA11G_Subpartition
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Subpartition table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -N[--to_sub_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -N part_15_sp1 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1317
Use case name: ORA11G_TimezoneTable_to_ORA11G_Subpartition_TruncateTarget
Description:  Copy Oracle11G table into Oracle11G Subpartition TruncateTarget table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle 11G db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -N[--to_sub_partition] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  python -c "print 'y\ny'" |C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Sub_Partitioned_test_to ^
  -N part_15_sp1 ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."

  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle 11G user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle 11G database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2ora11g ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Timezone_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -a SCOTT.Timezone_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Date_test_from ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Date_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -P[--from_partition] is "From partition."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."

  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."

  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^

  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Partitioned_test_from ^
  -P part_15 ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -K 1 ^

  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -P[--from_partition] is "From partition."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Partitioned_test_from ^
  -P part_15 ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b '(DESCRIPTION=(ADDRESS=(PROTOCOL=TCP)(HOST=localhost)(PORT=1521))(CONNECT_DATA=(SERVER=DEDICATED)(SERVICE_NAME=orcl)))' ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -U[--truncate_target] is "Truncate target table/partition/subpartition."
  -E[--ask_to_truncate] is "Ask to truncate."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."

  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."

  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."

  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."

  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."

  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -U 1 ^
  -E 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Partitioned_test_from ^
  -P part_15 ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^

  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -W 1 ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1332
Use case name: ORA11G_Partition_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Copy Oracle11G partition into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -c[--from_table] is "From table."
  -P[--from_partition] is "From partition."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -c SCOTT.Partitioned_test_from ^
  -P part_15 ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1334
Use case name: ORA11G_QueryDir_Limit10_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Read each SQL query file from a directory "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\query_dir_ora".
	  Copy only 10 rows from Oracle11G query results into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -l[--lame_duck] is "Limit rows (lame duck run)."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -1[--job_pre_etl] is "Path to job level pre-ETL Python script."
  -Q[--query_sql_dir] is "Input dir with Oracle 11G query files sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -l 10 ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -1 .\Scripts\job\delete_records.py ^
  -Q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\query_dir_ora ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

Use case name: ORA11G_QueryDir_WithWideRows_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Read each SQL query file from a directory "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\query_dir_ora".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -1[--job_pre_etl] is "Path to job level pre-ETL Python script."
  -3[--column_buckets] is "Wide row support."
  -Q[--query_sql_dir] is "Input dir with Oracle 11G query files sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -1 .\Scripts\job\delete_records.py ^
  -3 2 ^
  -Q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\query_dir_ora ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1339
Use case name: ORA11G_QueryFile_Limit10_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy only 10 rows from Oracle11G query results into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -l[--lame_duck] is "Limit rows (lame duck run)."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -l 10 ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1340
Use case name: ORA11G_QueryFile_WithWideRows_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -3[--column_buckets] is "Wide row support."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -3 2 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

-USE-CASE # 1341
Use case name: ORA11G_QueryFile_keepWhitespace_to_ORAXE_Table
Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".
	  Copy Oracle11G query results into OracleXE Table table.
Arguments:
  -w[--copy_vector] is "Data copy direction."
  -o[--pool_size] is "Pool size."
  -r[--num_of_shards] is "Number of shards."
  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -q[--query_sql_file] is "Input file with Oracle 11G query sql."
  -j[--from_user] is "Oracle 11G source user."
  -x[--from_passwd] is "Oracle 11G source user password."
  -b[--from_db_name] is "Oracle 11G source database."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for source."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_timestamp_format for source."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for source."
  -z[--source_client_home] is "Path to Oracle 11G client home."
  -W[--keep_whitespace] is "Keep whitespace from CHAR type in "Oracle 11G" extract."
  -u[--to_user] is "Target Oracle XE db user."
  -p[--to_passwd] is "Oracle XE user password."
  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."
  -a[--to_table] is "To Oracle table."
  -e[--nls_date_format] is "nls_date_format for target."
  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
  -O[--nls_timestamp_tz_format] is "nls_timestamp_tz_format for target."
  -Z[--target_client_home] is "Path to Oracle XE client home bin dir."	
Example: 
  echo y|C:\Python27\qc_dist_32\20150317_115247\qc32\qc32.exe ^
  -w ora11g2oraxe ^
  -o 1 ^
  -r 1 ^
  -t "|" ^
  -K 1 ^
  -M C:\Temp\qc_log ^
  -F C:\tmp\TEST_default_spool ^
  -B qc_job ^
  -Y 20150317_115247_901000 ^
  -q C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql ^
  -j SCOTT ^
  -x tiger2 ^
  -b orcl ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN" ^
  -W 1 ^
  -u SCOTT ^
  -p tiger2 ^
  -d orcl ^
  -a SCOTT.Timestamp_test_to ^
  -e "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS" ^
  -m "YYYY-MM-DD HH24.MI.SS.FF2" ^
  -O "YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS.FF2 TZH:TZM" ^
  -Z "C:\app\alex_buz\product\11.2.0\dbhome_2\BIN"

Description:  Read SQL from a query file "C:\Python27\data_migrator_1239\test\v101\query\oracle_query.sql".

Arguments:

  -t[--field_term] is "Field terminator."
  -K[--keep_data_file] is "Keep data dump."
  -M[--log_dir] is "Log destination."
  -F[--default_spool_dir] is "Default data dump dir (default_spool_dir/job_name/timestamp)."
  -B[--job_name] is "Job name (log_dir/job_name)."
  -Y[--time_stamp] is "Timestamp (log_dir/job_name/timestamp)."

  -d[--to_db_name] is "Oracle XE database."

  -m[--nls_timestamp_format] is "nls_time_format for target."
